needs.title: Power Saw
needs.description: Medium size power saw for cutting tree branches and limbs that have fallen down in the pasture.

neededBy.reason: Trees have fallen down in pasture blocking grass growth. Cows cannot get to the grass.

needs.title: Barb Wire - 5 Rolls
needs.description: 5 rolls of barb wire for fence repair and pasture restoration.

neededBy.reason: Needed for fence repair after hurricane damage.

needs.title: Staples for Fence Wire
needs.description: Staples needed for attaching barb wire to fence posts.

neededBy.reason: Required for securing barb wire to posts.

needs.title: Posts (Man Cut) - 500 posts
needs.description: 500 man-cut posts for fence construction and repair. Trees need to be cut with power saw to make posts.

neededBy.reason: Essential for fence repair. Posts need to be cut from trees using power saw.

needs.title: Chainsaw Labor
needs.description: Manual labor for chainsaw work to cut tree branches and limbs in pasture.

neededBy.reason: Trees need to be cut to clear pasture and allow grass to grow. Cows cannot access grass due to fallen trees.

needs.title: Machete Work Labor
needs.description: Manual labor for machete work to clear brush and small branches.

neededBy.reason: Additional clearing work needed after chainsaw operation.

needs.title: Manual Labor - Move Posts
needs.description: Manual labor to move posts (lift 20-30lbs) for fence construction.

neededBy.reason: Posts need to be moved and positioned for fence installation.

needs.notes: Workers need to be able to lift 20-30lbs repeatedly.
